ht.haapala.wss.controller
Class WorkShiftController

java.lang.Object
  ht.haapala.wss.controller.WorkShiftController

@Controller
@RequestMapping(value="shifts")
public class WorkShiftController
extends Object

Controller for work shift data. Users JSON for input and output.

Author:
Heikki Haapala

Method Detail

create

@RequestMapping(value="",
                method=POST,
                consumes="application/json",
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
@PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'employer\')")
public WorkShift create(@RequestBody
                                                                 WorkShift shift)
Handles POST requests to "shifts". Creates a new work shift with given data.

Parameters:
shift - given data from request body
Returns:
saved work shift

list

@RequestMapping(value="",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
@ResponseBody
@PreAuthorize(value="permitAll")
public List<WorkShift> list()
Handles GET requests to "shifts". Returns a list of all work shifts.

Returns:
a list of all work shifts

delete

@RequestMapping(value="{shiftId}",
                method=DELETE)
@ResponseBody
@PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'employer\')")
public void delete(@PathVariable
                                                            Long shiftId)
Handles DELETE requests to "shifts/id". Deletes the shift with the given id.

Parameters:
shiftId - id from path
